meanings.definition: A different version of a musical recording produced by remixing.
meanings.sent1: I love listening to the remix of my favorite song.
meanings.sent2: The DJ played a remix of the hit song at the party.
meanings.sent3: The remix of the song made everyone dance at the concert.
meanings.sent4: The remix added a fresh twist to the original melody.
meanings.sent5: The remix brought new life to the old tune.

meanings.sent1: I will remix the colors to create a new shade.
meanings.sent2: She decided to remix the ingredients for a better taste.
meanings.sent3: Let's remix the playlist for a fun road trip.
meanings.sent4: He likes to remix his workout routine every month.
meanings.sent5: The artist will remix the painting to enhance its beauty.

meanings.definition: A new version of a song or piece of music created by mixing together different recordings.
meanings.sent1: The DJ released a remix of the popular track.
meanings.sent2: Fans were excited to hear the new remix of the album.
meanings.sent3: The remix of the song had a catchy beat.
meanings.sent4: The band's remix of the classic tune was a hit.
meanings.sent5: The remix combined various sounds to create a unique melody.
